title: Trump says sending 'great hospital boat' to Greenland
desc: The US president said a vessel was "on the way" to Greenland, with the move coming amid a rift between the US and Europe over control of the island. Denmark hit back, saying no medical help was needed.

title: Rondale Moore cause of death: Minnesota Vikings' wide receiver found dead at his garage. He was only 25
desc: Rondale Moore, a 25-year-old NFL wide receiver, died in Indiana, with authorities investigating a suspected self-inflicted gunshot wound. The Minnesota Vikings expressed deep sadness and support for his family. Moore was known for his resilience and strong work ethic during his brief career.

title: Sharks win tug-of-war for Junior Bok
